title: DDFP 462: Rings vs. Stats, Von Miller's future & A.J. Hawk returns
itunes:title: DDFP 462: Rings vs. Stats, Von Miller's future & A.J. Hawk returns
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank & Marcas Grant to discuss Von Miller's contract situation, Cam Newton retiring the dab and the importance of championships over stats. A.J. Hawk returns to the show for the first installment of "Walk & Talk with Hawk." Plus, Hank, Shek and Marcas compete in another surprise game show, Kyle Long is back for the latest edition of Killin’ Time and the guys wrap with a chat about “Game of Thrones.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
